<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#ab998c57d668a1a2e439d626b8cb5cb6ba5f555c0d1cd740d7b15ba7f13187b8f4"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#ab998c57d668a1a2e439d626b8cb5cb6ba5f555c0d1cd740d7b15ba7f13187b8f4">Pointer</a>   = 0x10,   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See note below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: GEP indices generally traverse nested types, and so a GepNode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (representing a single index) can be associated with some composite</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// type. The exception is the GEP input, which is a pointer, and not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a composite type (at least not in the sense of having sub-types).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Also, the corresponding index plays a different role as well: it is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// simply added to the input pointer. Since pointer types are becoming</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opaque (i.e. are no longer going to include the pointee type), the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// two pieces of information (1) the fact that it&#39;s a pointer, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (2) the pointee type, need to be stored separately. The pointee type</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be stored in the PTy member, while the fact that the node</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operates on a pointer will be reflected by the flag &quot;Pointer&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#acec0a2e9ee72235c0a7d9967ec69849f"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#acec0a2e9ee72235c0a7d9967ec69849f">Flags</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">       UI != UE; ++UI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// duplication due to the commutativity of equality/non-equality.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478" lineLink="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af63cc9889b2c41a6de00cb55dbd4d8de">NodePair</a> <a href="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a">node&#95;pair</a>(GepNode &#42;N1, GepNode &#42;N2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  uintptr&#95;t P1 = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uintptr&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(N1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  uintptr&#95;t P2 = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uintptr&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(N2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (P1 &lt;= P2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(N1, N2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(N2, N1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486" lineLink="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb">node&#95;hash</a>(GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494" lineLink="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00">node&#95;eq</a>(GepNode &#42;N1, GepNode &#42;N2, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#a459e095622674d5e548005c7935b9fad">NodePairSet</a> &amp;Eq,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">                    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#a459e095622674d5e548005c7935b9fad">NodePairSet</a> &amp;Ne) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t cache the result for nodes with different hashes. The hash</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// comparison is fast enough.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb">node&#95;hash</a>(N1) != <a href="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb">node&#95;hash</a>(N2))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af63cc9889b2c41a6de00cb55dbd4d8de">NodePair</a> NP = <a href="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a">node&#95;pair</a>(N1, N2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">    NodePairSet::iterator FEq = Eq.find(NP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FEq != Eq.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    NodePairSet::iterator FNe = Ne.find(NP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FNe != Ne.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Not previously compared.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Root1 = N1-&gt;Flags &amp; GepNode::Root;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t CmpFlags = GepNode::Root | GepNode::Pointer;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Different = (N1-&gt;Flags &amp; CmpFlags) != (N2-&gt;Flags &amp; CmpFlags);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af63cc9889b2c41a6de00cb55dbd4d8de">NodePair</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a">node&#95;pair</a>(N1, N2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the root/pointer flags have different values, the nodes are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// different.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both nodes are root nodes, but their base pointers differ,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// they are different.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Different || (Root1 &amp;&amp; N1-&gt;BaseVal != N2-&gt;BaseVal)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">      Ne.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here the root/pointer flags are identical, and for root nodes the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// base pointers are equal, so the root nodes are equal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For non-root nodes, compare their parent nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Root1 || <a href="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00">node&#95;eq</a>(N1-&gt;Parent, N2-&gt;Parent, Eq, Ne)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">      Eq.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HexagonCommonGEP::common() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The essence of this commoning is finding gep nodes that are equal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To do this we need to compare all pairs of nodes. To save time,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first, partition the set of all nodes into sets of potentially equal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// nodes, and then compare pairs from within each partition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">NodeSetMap = std::map&lt;unsigned, NodeSet&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">  NodeSetMap MaybeEq;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : Nodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a> = <a href="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb">node&#95;hash</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaybeEq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>&#93;.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the equivalence relation for the gep nodes.  Use two caches,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one for equality and the other for non-equality.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#acaa4e34ced9ca464a485bef998fd70cd">NodeSymRel</a> EqRel;  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Equality relation (as set of equivalence classes).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#a459e095622674d5e548005c7935b9fad">NodePairSet</a> Eq, Ne;  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Caches.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : MaybeEq) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> &amp;S = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NI = S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a338faa1a1ee255653958fa9d3738d97d">begin</a>(), NE = S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a7b0a84486e65de95b236e90073067540">end</a>(); NI != NE; ++NI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">      GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = &#42;NI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If node already has a class, then the class must have been created</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in a prior iteration of this loop. Since equality is transitive,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// nothing more will be added to that class, so skip it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a21cbbab6a6991f925afed97ead5bbf49">node&#95;class</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, EqRel))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create a new class candidate now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NJ = std::next(NI); NJ != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a191e89dbc4939ebd0b572cae44aac05f">NE</a>; ++NJ)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00">node&#95;eq</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, &#42;NJ, Eq, Ne))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.insert(&#42;NJ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Tmp is empty, N would be the only element in it. Don&#39;t bother</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// creating a class for it then.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finalize the set before adding it to the relation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::pair&lt;NodeSymRel::iterator, bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipsisd/#a422daf9aa810935178671306b651d69bad5006873d15f9569d1cf09deef3c6363">Ins</a> = EqRel.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">        (void)Ins;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipsisd/#a422daf9aa810935178671306b651d69bad5006873d15f9569d1cf09deef3c6363">Ins</a>.second &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot add a class&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">ProjMap = std::map&lt;const NodeSet &#42;, GepNode &#42;&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">  ProjMap PM;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> &amp;S : EqRel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">    GepNode &#42;Min = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b1373fa0f76edbe1c0999d7d207c9c4">llvm::min&#95;element</a>(S, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a31669aae44fa7e6414dd5cd81e2b16f8">NodeOrder</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">    (void)Ins;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipsisd/#a422daf9aa810935178671306b651d69bad5006873d15f9569d1cf09deef3c6363">Ins</a>.second &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot add minimal element&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the min element&#39;s flags, and user list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t Flags = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af31e9c8ac9a922bab3f3c94f42658ac7">UseSet</a> &amp;MinUs = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;Min&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : S) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t NF = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;Flags;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If N is used, append all original values of N to the list of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// original values of Min.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NF &amp; GepNode::Used)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">        MinUs.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a2fdb10193ae65fe59b4d8df288044864">begin</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">      Flags |= NF;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The collected flags should include all the flags from the min element.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Min-&gt;Flags &amp; Flags) == Min-&gt;Flags);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">    Min-&gt;Flags = Flags;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Commoning: for each non-root gep node, replace &quot;Parent&quot; with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// selected (minimum) node from the corresponding equivalence class.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a given parent does not have an equivalence class, leave it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the nearest common dominator for:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
